<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- SpillPlacement.cpp - Optimal Spill Code Placement ------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements the spill code placement analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each edge bundle corresponds to a node in a Hopfield network. Constraints on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// basic blocks are weighted by the block frequency and added to become the node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transparent basic blocks have the variable live through, but don&#39;t care if it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is spilled or in a register. These blocks become connections in the Hopfield</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// network, again weighted by block frequency.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Hopfield network minimizes (possibly locally) its energy function:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   E = -sum&#95;n V&#95;n &#42; ( B&#95;n + sum&#95;&#123;n, m linked by b&#125; V&#95;m &#42; F&#95;b )</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The energy function represents the expected spill code execution frequency,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or the cost of spilling. This is a Lyapunov function which never increases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when a node is updated. It is guaranteed to converge to a local minimum.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/spillplacement-h">llvm/CodeGen/SpillPlacement.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/bitvector-h">llvm/ADT/BitVector.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The node contains precomputed frequency data that only depends on the CFG,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// but Bias and Links are computed each time placeSpills is called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The node Value is positive when the variable should be in a register. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// value can change when linked nodes change, but convergence is very fast</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// because all weights are positive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node">SpillPlacement::Node</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// preferReg - Return true when this node prefers to be in a register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a15e88c2cf83e7164d2d0d85ed00f9b31"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a15e88c2cf83e7164d2d0d85ed00f9b31">preferReg</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Undecided nodes (Value==0) go on the stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a> &gt; 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// mustSpill - Return True if this node is so biased that it must spill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#ae39aa56454ff85c86ddd1aca307354bd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#ae39aa56454ff85c86ddd1aca307354bd">mustSpill</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We must spill if Bias &lt; -sum(weights) or the MustSpill flag was set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BiasN is saturated when MustSpill is set, make sure this still returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// true when the RHS saturates. Note that SumLinkWeights includes Threshold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a370ae71068f6725ac2c6b61cf66a05b4">BiasN</a> &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a67abf92d6eabc03f37e9a2bd422e290a">BiasP</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a2b91674cb12c7e0eb5bddcd71213e4c6">SumLinkWeights</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// clear - Reset per-query data, but preserve frequencies that only depend on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the CFG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#ac905ce5783c59de0655d9733cd1f6b83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#ac905ce5783c59de0655d9733cd1f6b83">clear</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> Threshold) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a370ae71068f6725ac2c6b61cf66a05b4">BiasN</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a67abf92d6eabc03f37e9a2bd422e290a">BiasP</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a2b91674cb12c7e0eb5bddcd71213e4c6">SumLinkWeights</a> = Threshold;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a5a13362b22c15eb1235eacd5f8440ed4">Links</a>.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// addLink - Add a link to bundle b with weight w.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a414c03213909b5fd790e6f1b505b7099"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a414c03213909b5fd790e6f1b505b7099">addLink</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> b, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> w) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update cached sum.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a2b91674cb12c7e0eb5bddcd71213e4c6">SumLinkWeights</a> += w;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There can be multiple links to the same bundle, add them up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::pair&lt;BlockFrequency, unsigned&gt; &amp;L : <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a5a13362b22c15eb1235eacd5f8440ed4">Links</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (L.second == b) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">        L.first += w;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This must be the first link to b.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a5a13362b22c15eb1235eacd5f8440ed4">Links</a>.push&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(w, b));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// addBias - Bias this node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a03bf04c760f4e0dc8f8673a6dbbc1f37"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a03bf04c760f4e0dc8f8673a6dbbc1f37">addBias</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-cpp/#a6228da6ce1f2cdae97b17637c061011e">freq</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8c">BorderConstraint</a> direction) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (direction) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8caca6da2dad218232636b80854d81a6e1c">PrefReg</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a67abf92d6eabc03f37e9a2bd422e290a">BiasP</a> += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-cpp/#a6228da6ce1f2cdae97b17637c061011e">freq</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8caf5efe10871d66719c8668d09d768e740">PrefSpill</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a370ae71068f6725ac2c6b61cf66a05b4">BiasN</a> += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-cpp/#a6228da6ce1f2cdae97b17637c061011e">freq</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8ca043a091e52f465df92623f5f17477837">MustSpill</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a370ae71068f6725ac2c6b61cf66a05b4">BiasN</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency/#a5bd2a8de4fde83093df0cc2415db2312">BlockFrequency::max</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// update - Recompute Value from Bias and Links. Return true when node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// preference changes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a25feab88416725ad9114fbb86af5dfc1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a25feab88416725ad9114fbb86af5dfc1">update</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node">Node</a> nodes&#91;&#93;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> Threshold) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the weighted sum of inputs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> SumN = <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a370ae71068f6725ac2c6b61cf66a05b4">BiasN</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> SumP = <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a67abf92d6eabc03f37e9a2bd422e290a">BiasP</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::pair&lt;BlockFrequency, unsigned&gt; &amp;L : <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a5a13362b22c15eb1235eacd5f8440ed4">Links</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (nodes&#91;L.second&#93;.Value == -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SumN += L.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (nodes&#91;L.second&#93;.Value == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SumP += L.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each weighted sum is going to be less than the total frequency of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bundle. Ideally, we should simply set Value = sign(SumP - SumN), but we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will add a dead zone around 0 for two reasons:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1 It avoids arbitrary bias when all links are 0 as is possible during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     initial iterations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  2 It helps tame rounding errors when the links nominally sum to 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/standardinstrumentations-cpp/#a6f1bbcae7288f05872dcfe811d0388baa9060587edeb01a63e3d3edc959678d1e">Before</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a15e88c2cf83e7164d2d0d85ed00f9b31">preferReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SumN &gt;= SumP + Threshold)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a> = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SumP &gt;= SumN + Threshold)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a> = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/standardinstrumentations-cpp/#a6f1bbcae7288f05872dcfe811d0388baa9060587edeb01a63e3d3edc959678d1e">Before</a> != <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a15e88c2cf83e7164d2d0d85ed00f9b31">preferReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#af1f662c46e92ef73f72533ef32887586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#af1f662c46e92ef73f72533ef32887586">getDissentingNeighbors</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparseset">SparseSet&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acefe92adee8725ad904c7c43649790e8a4ee29ca12c7d126654bd0e5275de6135">List</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node">Node</a> nodes&#91;&#93;)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Elt : <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a5a13362b22c15eb1235eacd5f8440ed4">Links</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n = Elt.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Neighbors that already have the same value are not going to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// change because of this node changing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a> != nodes&#91;n&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acefe92adee8725ad904c7c43649790e8a4ee29ca12c7d126654bd0e5275de6135">List</a>.insert(n);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SpillPlacementWrapperLegacy::runOnMachineFunction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Bundles = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;EdgeBundlesWrapperLegacy&gt;</a>().getEdgeBundles();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;MBFI = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;MachineBlockFrequencyInfoWrapperPass&gt;</a>().getMBFI();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Impl.run(MF, Bundles, MBFI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute total ingoing and outgoing block frequencies for all bundles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BlockFrequencies.resize(mf.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#aa22424ba23740b6a748e8d0c239b7e4c">getNumBlockIDs</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  setThreshold(MBFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineblockfrequencyinfo/#aa9c041cb61532576659d652739439acc">getEntryFreq</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : mf) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Num = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getNumber();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BlockFrequencies&#91;Num&#93; = MBFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineblockfrequencyinfo/#a7dd7fa8c0a91118934b08b516b6e9d37">getBlockFreq</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// activate - mark node n as active if it wasn&#39;t already.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SpillPlacement::activate(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TodoList.insert(n);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ActiveNodes-&gt;test(n))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ActiveNodes-&gt;set(n);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  nodes&#91;n&#93;.clear(Threshold);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Very large bundles usually come from big switches, indirect branches,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// landing pads, or loops with many &#39;continue&#39; statements. It is difficult to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocate registers when so many different blocks are involved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Give a small negative bias to large bundles such that a substantial</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fraction of the connected blocks need to be interested before we consider</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expanding the region through the bundle. This helps compile time by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// limiting the number of blocks visited and the number of links in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hopfield network.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (bundles-&gt;getBlocks(n).size() &gt; 100) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    nodes&#91;n&#93;.BiasP = BlockFrequency(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BlockFrequency BiasN = MBFI-&gt;getEntryFreq();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BiasN &gt;&gt;= 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    nodes&#91;n&#93;.BiasN = BiasN;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Set the threshold for a given entry frequency.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Set the threshold relative to \\c Entry.  Since the threshold is used as a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// bound on the open interval (-Threshold;Threshold), 1 is the minimum</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// threshold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SpillPlacement::setThreshold(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> Entry) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apparently 2 is a good threshold when Entry==2^14, but we need to scale</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it.  Divide by 2^13, rounding as appropriate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Freq = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.getFrequency();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcinstrinfo-cpp/#a5d6e37f3d036496321824378223ad718a8009351707fa969013ab5d9126bab03e">Scaled</a> = (Freq &gt;&gt; 13) + </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Freq &amp; (1 &lt;&lt; 12));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Threshold = BlockFrequency(std::max(UINT64&#95;C(1), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcinstrinfo-cpp/#a5d6e37f3d036496321824378223ad718a8009351707fa969013ab5d9126bab03e">Scaled</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// addConstraints - Compute node biases and weights from a set of constraints.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Set a bit in NodeMask for each active node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a0d46b9b2cb2caf78e65bbd56644fc0f2"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a0d46b9b2cb2caf78e65bbd56644fc0f2">SpillPlacement::addConstraints</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BlockConstraint&gt;</a> LiveBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spillplacement/blockconstraint">BlockConstraint</a> &amp;LB : LiveBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> Freq = BlockFrequencies&#91;LB.Number&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Live-in to block?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LB.Entry != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8ca49b6f21cf41c5b608cb5645bc70d36b8">DontCare</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ib = bundles-&gt;getBundle(LB.Number, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">      activate(ib);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">      nodes&#91;ib&#93;.addBias(Freq, LB.Entry);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Live-out from block?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LB.Exit != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8ca49b6f21cf41c5b608cb5645bc70d36b8">DontCare</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ob = bundles-&gt;getBundle(LB.Number, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">      activate(ob);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">      nodes&#91;ob&#93;.addBias(Freq, LB.Exit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// addPrefSpill - Same as addConstraints(PrefSpill)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a2bd552babf3d34952ed159b653515b5e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a2bd552babf3d34952ed159b653515b5e">SpillPlacement::addPrefSpill</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> Blocks, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Strong) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> : Blocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> Freq = BlockFrequencies&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Strong)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Freq += Freq;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ib = bundles-&gt;getBundle(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ob = bundles-&gt;getBundle(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    activate(ib);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    nodes&#91;ib&#93;.addBias(Freq, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8caf5efe10871d66719c8668d09d768e740">PrefSpill</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af83da56920f4f1059b02e07966f9fccfab2ee912b91d69b435159c7c3f6df7f5f">Number</a> : Links) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore self-loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ib == ob)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    activate(ib);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    activate(ob);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> Freq = BlockFrequencies&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af83da56920f4f1059b02e07966f9fccfab2ee912b91d69b435159c7c3f6df7f5f">Number</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    nodes&#91;ib&#93;.addLink(ob, Freq);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    nodes&#91;ob&#93;.addLink(ib, Freq);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a435b043e417bb3f4fc9ac0f6e0c6ebc8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a435b043e417bb3f4fc9ac0f6e0c6ebc8">SpillPlacement::scanActiveBundles</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RecentPositive.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n : ActiveNodes-&gt;set&#95;bits()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    update(n);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A node that must spill, or a node without any links is not going to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// change its value ever again, so exclude it from iterations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (nodes&#91;n&#93;.mustSpill())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (nodes&#91;n&#93;.preferReg())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RecentPositive.push&#95;back(n);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !RecentPositive.empty();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SpillPlacement::update(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1f108d77e1ecf5e30bbd3c7d8818af84">nodes</a>&#91;n&#93;.update(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1f108d77e1ecf5e30bbd3c7d8818af84">nodes</a>.get(), Threshold))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// iterate - Repeatedly update the Hopfield nodes until stability or the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// maximum number of iterations is reached.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a8d70270c78d36ddb40a8b782e141b63a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a8d70270c78d36ddb40a8b782e141b63a">SpillPlacement::iterate</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We do not need to push those node in the todolist.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// They are already been proceeded as part of the previous iteration.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RecentPositive.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since the last iteration, the todolist have been augmented by calls</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to addConstraints, addLinks, and co.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the network energy starting at this new frontier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The call to ::update will add the nodes that changed into the todolist.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Limit = bundles-&gt;getNumBundles() &#42; 10;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Limit-- &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; !TodoList.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n = TodoList.pop&#95;back&#95;val();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!update(n))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (nodes&#91;n&#93;.preferReg())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RecentPositive.push&#95;back(n);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a329177b9cd260516a4aca8f55c199020"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a329177b9cd260516a4aca8f55c199020">SpillPlacement::prepare</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp;RegBundles) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RecentPositive.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TodoList.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reuse RegBundles as our ActiveNodes vector.</span></CodeLine>
